halox.nfw: The NFW profile
==============================

``halox`` provides utility functions to compute properties of halos with a Navarro-Frenk-White (NFW) profile.

.. currentmodule:: halox.nfw

.. autosummary::
    NFWHalo

.. autoclass:: NFWHalo
    :member-order: bysource
    :members: density, enclosed_mass, potential, circular_velocity, velocity_dispersion, surface_density, to_delta
